turns.speaker: client
turns.text: good morning

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good morning, thank you for coming to Starbucks of Decatur, Texas. how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a white chocolate mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and would you like that hot or on ice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can I get that hot, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course. can I interest you in a blueberry muffin, too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah, that sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay and is there anything else I can add to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no, I think that'll do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, your total will be...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: all right, here you go, you can keep the change.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, thank you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and can I get your name?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sure, it's John.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, we'll have your order to you in just a moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: John, I have your muffin ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. and here is your drink order, sir

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: oh, great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. you have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you do the same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll do my best. don't forget your muffin

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: oh, right, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: take care now

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you, too
